Slimebound:SplitBronze.NAME: Split: Bronze
Slimebound:SplitBronze.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Bronze_Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitBronze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Bronze_Slime twice. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:GangUp.NAME: Gang Up
Slimebound:GangUp.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Bruiser_Slime X times. NL Bruiser_Slimes deal !M! more damage this combat. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:GangUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Bruiser_Slime X+1 times. NL Bruiser_Slimes deal !M! more damage this combat. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitTorchHead.NAME: Split: Torch Head
Slimebound:SplitTorchHead.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Torch_Head_Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitTorchHead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Torch_Head_Slime twice. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitBruiser.NAME: Split: Bruiser
Slimebound:SplitBruiser.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Bruiser_Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitBruiser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Bruiser_Slime. NL Bruiser_Slimes deal 1 more damage this combat. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitCultist.NAME: Split: Cultist
Slimebound:SplitCultist.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Cultist_Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitCultist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Cultist_Slime twice. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitLeeching.NAME: Split: Leeching
Slimebound:SplitLeeching.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Leeching_Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitLeeching.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Leeching_Slime. NL Leeching_Slimes grant 1 more Block this combat. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitAcid.NAME: Split: Acid
Slimebound:SplitAcid.DESCRIPTION: Split into an Acid_Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitAcid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Acid_Slime. NL Acid_Slimes apply 1 more Poison this combat. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitMire.NAME: Split: Mire
Slimebound:SplitMire.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Mire_Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitMire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Mire_Slime. NL Mire_Slimes apply 1 more Slimed this combat. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ProtectTheBoss.NAME: Protect the Boss
Slimebound:ProtectTheBoss.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would damaged by an enemy Attack, losing your oldest Slime instead.
Slimebound:ProtectTheBoss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next 2 times you would damaged by an enemy Attack, losing your oldest Slime instead.

Slimebound:SamplingLick.NAME: Sampling Lick
Slimebound:SamplingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SamplingLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DuplicateSlimes.NAME: Replication
Slimebound:DuplicateSlimes.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate all of your spawned Slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Replication.NAME: Replication
Slimebound:Replication.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Add a copy of that card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:AbsorbAll.NAME: Absorption
Slimebound:AbsorbAll.DESCRIPTION: Absorb all of your spawned Slimes. Gain 3 Block per slime Absorbed.

Slimebound:Overexert.NAME: Overexert
Slimebound:Overexert.DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 Potency. NL !M! turns from now, Absorb all of your spawned slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Split.NAME: Split
Slimebound:Split.DESCRIPTION: Split into a random slime. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SuperSplit.NAME: Super Split
Slimebound:SuperSplit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Slime slots. NL Split into a random slime four times. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SuperSplit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Slime slots. NL Split into a random slime four times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DivideAndConquer.NAME: Divide & Conquer
Slimebound:DivideAndConquer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Split into a random slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:DivideAndConquer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Split into a random slime twice. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:LeadByExample.NAME: Lead By Example
Slimebound:LeadByExample.DESCRIPTION: The first Attack you play each turn also causes your oldest slime to Attack.
Slimebound:LeadByExample.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! Attacks you play each turn also cause your oldest slime to Attack.

Slimebound:SlimeTap.NAME: Slime Tap
Slimebound:SlimeTap.DESCRIPTION: Absorb your oldest Slime. Gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SlimeTap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Absorb your 2 oldest Slimes. Gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards for each Absorbed. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Teamwork.NAME: Teamwork
Slimebound:Teamwork.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your !M! oldest Slime's attacks X times.
Slimebound:Teamwork.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Trigger your oldest Slime's attack X times.

Slimebound:SlimeBarrage.NAME: Slime Barrage
Slimebound:SlimeBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Trigger all of your Slime's attacks.

Slimebound:SlimeBrawl.NAME: Slime Brawl
Slimebound:SlimeBrawl.DESCRIPTION: Play and Exhaust the top card of your draw pile. Repeat for each of your spawned Slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SelfFormingGoo.NAME: Self-Forming Goo
Slimebound:SelfFormingGoo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, gain !M! Block at the start of your next turn.

Slimebound:SlimeSpikes.NAME: Slime Spikes
Slimebound:SlimeSpikes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Thorns. NL Lose !M! Thorns at the start of your next turn.

Slimebound:FormABlockade.NAME: Form A Blockade
Slimebound:FormABlockade.DESCRIPTION: Split into a random slime. NL Gain !B! Block, plus !M! Block for each spawned Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:FormABlockade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a random slime twice. NL Gain !B! Block, plus !M! Block for each spawned Slime. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:LeechingTouch.NAME: Leeching Touch
Slimebound:LeechingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to an enemy's Slimed. NL Deal !D! damage.

Slimebound:Dissolve.NAME: Dissolve
Slimebound:Dissolve.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a number of random 0-cost cards to your hand equal to it's cost. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Dissolve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a number of random 0-cost cards to your hand equal to it's cost plus 1. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DuplicatedForm.NAME: Duplicated Form
Slimebound:DuplicatedForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose half Max HP this combat. NL Gain [E] each turn. NL The first 2 cards you play each turn that targets enemies are played twice.
Slimebound:DuplicatedForm.DESCRIPTION: Lose half Max HP this combat. NL Gain [E] each turn. NL The first card you play each turn that targets enemies is played twice.

Slimebound:Recollect.NAME: Recollect
Slimebound:Recollect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.
Slimebound:Recollect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return 2 random 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.

Slimebound:GrowthPunch.NAME: Growth Punch
Slimebound:GrowthPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Increase this card's damage permanently by !M!. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:GrowthPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase these effects permanently by !M!. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:CheckThePlaybook.NAME: Consult Playbook
Slimebound:CheckThePlaybook.DESCRIPTION: Add 4 random Tackle cards to your hand. They cost 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Recycling.NAME: Recycling
Slimebound:Recycling.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, return a random Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.
Slimebound:Recycling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, return a random Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.

Slimebound:Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
Slimebound:Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: Morph a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Repurpose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Morph up to 2 cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:RollThrough.NAME: Roll Through
Slimebound:RollThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Enemies receive !M! more damage from cards containing "Tackle" this combat.

Slimebound:MassRepurpose.NAME: Mass Repurpose
Slimebound:MassRepurpose.DESCRIPTION: Morph all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SoTasty.NAME: SO TASTY!
Slimebound:SoTasty.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. Add X random Lick cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Regenerate.NAME: Regenerate
Slimebound:Regenerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Lick.NAME: Lick
Slimebound:Lick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Lick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:HauntingLick.NAME: Haunting Lick
Slimebound:HauntingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable and !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:HauntingLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable and !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:PoisonLick.NAME: Poison Lick
Slimebound:PoisonLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed and !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Poison. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:PoisonLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed and !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Poison. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:MegaLick.NAME: Mega-Lick
Slimebound:MegaLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:MegaLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed to ALL enemies. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:FocusedLick.NAME: Focused Lick
Slimebound:FocusedLick.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak and Poison, replacing them with Slimed. NL Apply !M! Slimed.
Slimebound:FocusedLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak and Poison, replacing them with Slimed. NL Apply !M! Slimed.

Slimebound:RejuvenatingLick.NAME: Rejuvenating Lick
Slimebound:RejuvenatingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:RejuvenatingLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
Slimebound:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: The first card containing Lick you play each turn adds a random Lick card to your hand.
Slimebound:Gluttony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first card containing Lick you play each turn adds 2 random Lick cards to your hand.

Slimebound:PressTheAttack.NAME: Press the Attack
Slimebound:PressTheAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy was Slimed, trigger your oldest slime's attack.
Slimebound:PressTheAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy was Slimed, trigger your oldest slime's attack twice.

Slimebound:StrikeFrailPoint.NAME: Cull the Frail
Slimebound:StrikeFrailPoint.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is Frail, remove all of their Block, then remove 1 Frail. NL Deal !D! damage.

Slimebound:SoulSicken.NAME: Soul Sicken
Slimebound:SoulSicken.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Convert half of the enemy's Slimed to Poison. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SoulSicken.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Convert half of the enemy's Slimed to Poison.

Slimebound:AcidGelatin.NAME: Acid Gelatin
Slimebound:AcidGelatin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! Poison to the attacker.

Slimebound:TongueLash.NAME: Tongue Lash
Slimebound:TongueLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage for ALL of your cards containing "Lick".

Slimebound:ItLooksTasty.NAME: It Looks Tasty
Slimebound:ItLooksTasty.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random Lick card to your hand if the enemy was Slimed.
Slimebound:ItLooksTasty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add two random Lick cards to your hand if the enemy was Slimed.

Slimebound:AcidTongue.NAME: Acid Tongue
Slimebound:AcidTongue.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison whenever you apply Slimed.
Slimebound:AcidTongue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison whenever you apply Slimed. NL Effects that apply Slimed apply 1 more.

Slimebound:TendrilStrike.NAME: Toxin Strike
Slimebound:TendrilStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy has Poison, trigger the Poison's end of turn effect.
Slimebound:TendrilStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy has Poison, trigger the Poison's end of turn effect twice.

Slimebound:FirmFortitude.NAME: Feel Our Pain
Slimebound:FirmFortitude.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you would lose HP on YOUR turn, an enemy takes that much damage instead.

Slimebound:AccelerateToxins.NAME: Accelerate Toxins
Slimebound:AccelerateToxins.DESCRIPTION: For each Poisoned enemy, trigger the Poison's end of turn effect. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:AccelerateToxins.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For each Poisoned enemy, trigger the Poison's end of turn effect twice. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:QuickStudy.NAME: Quick Study
Slimebound:QuickStudy.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Spire_Boss card to your hand. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:QuickStudy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 2 random Spire_Boss cards to your hand. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:WasteNot.NAME: Waste Not
Slimebound:WasteNot.DESCRIPTION: Return all 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
Slimebound:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Prepare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Retain up to !M! cards this turn. Exhaust.

Slimebound:Grow.NAME: Grow
Slimebound:Grow.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Slime slot in exchange for !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.
Slimebound:Grow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Slime slot in exchange for !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1.

Slimebound:HungryTackle.NAME: Hungry Tackle
Slimebound:HungryTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.
Slimebound:HungryTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Return 2 random 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.

Slimebound:FinishingTackle.NAME: Finishing Tackle
Slimebound:FinishingTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL If this kills an enemy, gain !B! Block.

Slimebound:SlimesplosionOLD.NAME: Slimesplosion
Slimebound:SlimesplosionOLD.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Slimed and !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Poison to ALL enemies X times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:LivingWall.NAME: Living Wall
Slimebound:LivingWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed to attackers this turn.

Slimebound:Slimepotheosis.NAME: Slimepotheosis
Slimebound:Slimepotheosis.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand. Lose !M! HP for each card Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ComboTackle.NAME: Combo Tackle
Slimebound:ComboTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
Slimebound:ComboTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Upgrade 2 random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

Slimebound:GoopTackle.NAME: Goop Tackle
Slimebound:GoopTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Add a random Tackle card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Slimebound:GoopTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Add a random Upgraded Tackle card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

Slimebound:Chomp.NAME: Chomp
Slimebound:Chomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL The enemy receives !M! additional damage from cards containing "Tackle" this combat.

Slimebound:DouseInSlime.NAME: Douse in Slime
Slimebound:DouseInSlime.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed. NL Slimed will not decay on the enemy this turn.

Slimebound:FlameTackle.NAME: Flame Tackle
Slimebound:FlameTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Cards containing "Tackle" deal !M! more damage this combat.

Slimebound:VenomTackle.NAME: Venom Tackle
Slimebound:VenomTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Apply !M! Poison.

Slimebound:RainOfGoop.NAME: Rain of Goop
Slimebound:RainOfGoop.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed to a random enemy !M! times. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:RainOfGoop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed to a random enemy !M! times.

Slimebound:GoopSpray.NAME: Goop Spray
Slimebound:GoopSpray.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed and !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:MassFeed.NAME: Mass Feed
Slimebound:MassFeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL For each non-minion enemy killed, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:StrayGoop.NAME: Stray Goop
Slimebound:StrayGoop.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Slimed to a random enemy whenever you lose HP on your turn.

Slimebound:ViciousTackle.NAME: Vicious Tackle
Slimebound:ViciousTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. This gains twice the damage bonus from Slimed.
Slimebound:ViciousTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and !SlimeboundSelfDamage! damage to yourself. This gains twice the damage bonus AND healing from Slimed.

Slimebound:LeechEnergy.NAME: Leech Energy
Slimebound:LeechEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw a card if the enemy has Poison.
Slimebound:LeechEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw a card if the enemy has Poison. Gain [E] if they have Slimed.

Slimebound:LeechLife.NAME: Leech Life
Slimebound:LeechLife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Equalize.NAME: Equalize
Slimebound:Equalize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, heal !M! HP. NL This card is played twice if below half of max HP. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DisruptingSlam.NAME: Disrupting Slam
Slimebound:DisruptingSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Enemies who do not intend to attack are struck twice.

Slimebound:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
Slimebound:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
Slimebound:GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 4 times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DefensiveMode.NAME: Defensive Mode
Slimebound:DefensiveMode.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Gain !B! Block, and another !B! Block next turn.

Slimebound:PrepareCrush.NAME: Prepare: Crush
Slimebound:PrepareCrush.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:PrepareCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SlimeCrush.NAME: SLIME CRUSH!!!
Slimebound:SlimeCrush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Skip your next turn. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitGhostflame.NAME: Split: Ghostflame
Slimebound:SplitGhostflame.DESCRIPTION: Gain Slime Slots until you have 6. NL Split into a Ghostflame_Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitGhostflame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Slime Slots until you have 6. NL Split into two Ghostflame_Slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:PrepareDivider.NAME: Prepare: Divide
Slimebound:PrepareDivider.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Divide to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:PrepareDivider.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Divide to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Hexaburn.NAME: Hexaburn
Slimebound:Hexaburn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:PrepareBeam.NAME: Prepare: Beam
Slimebound:PrepareBeam.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Hyper Beam to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:PrepareBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Hyper Beam to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SlimeBeam.NAME: Slime Beam
Slimebound:SlimeBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Flail.NAME: Flail
Slimebound:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
Slimebound:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block at the end of each turn.

Slimebound:FaceSlap.NAME: Face Slap
Slimebound:FaceSlap.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
Slimebound:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain !M! Strength, or !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Strength if you are below half HP. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Collect.NAME: Collect
Slimebound:Collect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and 1 Potency. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:YouAreMine.NAME: YOU ARE MINE!
Slimebound:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies and remove all of their Block. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:OozeBath.NAME: Ooze Bath
Slimebound:OozeBath.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Slimed. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:OozeBath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Poison and Slimed. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:CaCaw.NAME: CA-CAW!
Slimebound:CaCaw.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength at the start of each turn.
Slimebound:CaCaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Strength at the start of each turn.

Slimebound:DarkVoid.NAME: Dark Void
Slimebound:DarkVoid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. The next time each enemy does not Attack on their turn, gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:TimeRipple.NAME: Time Ripple
Slimebound:TimeRipple.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply Slow to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:HeadSlam.NAME: Head Slam
Slimebound:HeadSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Stun the enemy if they are not a Boss. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ManipulateTime.NAME: Manipulate Time
Slimebound:ManipulateTime.DESCRIPTION: Trigger all effects that happen at the start of your turn. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:ManipulateTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger all effects that happen at the start of your turn, then trigger them again. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DonusPower.NAME: Donu's Power
Slimebound:DonusPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:DonusPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DecasProtection.NAME: Deca's Protection
Slimebound:DecasProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:DecasProtection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:PolyBeam.NAME: Poly Beam
Slimebound:PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Deal !D! damage twice at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Sear.NAME: Sear
Slimebound:Sear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus an additional !M! damage every turn this combat. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:StudyAutomaton.NAME: Study Automaton
Slimebound:StudyAutomaton.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Automaton card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
Slimebound:StudyAutomaton.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Automaton card to your hand at the start of each turn.

Slimebound:StudyTheSpire.NAME: Study the Spire
Slimebound:StudyTheSpire.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Spire_Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
Slimebound:StudyTheSpire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Spire_Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.

Slimebound:StudyAwakened.NAME: Study Awakened
Slimebound:StudyAwakened.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Awakened One card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
Slimebound:StudyAwakened.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Awakened One card to your hand at the start of each turn.

Slimebound:StudyChamp.NAME: Study the Champ
Slimebound:StudyChamp.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Champ card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
Slimebound:StudyChamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Champ card to your hand at the start of each turn.

Slimebound:StudyCollector.NAME: Study Collector
Slimebound:StudyCollector.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Collector card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
Slimebound:StudyCollector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Collector card to your hand at the start of each turn.
